level.heading: Payment of water rents from Washington Aqueduct into General Fund.
level.text: All water rents derived from the Washington Aqueduct shall be paid into the General Fund of the District of Columbia as established by the Revenue Funds Availability Act of 1975.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2401.13.
